cont.entity_a: Balanced, clean, and clear sound with detailed upper frequencies and voices. Excellent sound quality for the price. Sound quality is crisp and clear, with no distortion at high volumes.
cont.entity_b: Good sound quality for TV listening, but not recommended for music. Sound quality may not meet expectations for the price.

cont.entity_a: Capable of very deep bass, but additional EQ is needed for enhanced bass.
Very durable, withstanding years of use and physical stress. Long-lasting build, suitable for long listening sessions.
cont.entity_b: Durability concerns with frame and earpiece connections.

cont.entity_a: Comfortable with a great adjustment system, fitting a range of head sizes. Ear pads are not very comfortable and may cause discomfort over time. Earcups fit on-ear rather than over-ear, which may not be comfortable for everyone.
cont.entity_b: Loose fit, easily falls off the head, especially when moving. Comfortable but not suitable for exercise due to loose fit. Lightweight and comfortable, but may not fit all head sizes well.

cont.entity_a: Cord is well made and sturdy, but too long for portable use. The coiled cord prevents tangling but is bulky. Coiled cord may not be ideal for close setups.

cont.entity_b: Allowing external sounds to be heard.

cont.entity_a: Comes with a plug adapter and carrying bag.
Price is reasonable under $100, but overpriced above that.
cont.entity_b: Priced reasonably for the sound quality and features offered.

cont.entity_a: Some units may have quality control issues with material and sound.
Great for studio monitoring with a flat response.

cont.entity_b: Physical switch for power and volume scroll wheel for easy operation. Volume control and tuning are close together, which may cause confusion.
Wireless technology may cause static and interference issues. Static pops and clicks may occur, affecting listening experience.
Difficult setup with some TVs, may require additional equipment.
Battery life is generally good, but may require frequent adjustments.
The charging cradle may not always make a good connection.
May require frequent tuning adjustments for clear sound.
